body: Since we aren't getting any traction on the blocking issues here, I've disabled the CSP `frame-ancestors` directive entirely, for the entire site. This is no worse than what we have today, and this PR is blocking a deployment of other security issues: the rest of CSP, SRI, and LDAP authentication.
